Component.description: Metadata about measured components of nutritional interest

laboratory_sample_aggregation_maximum_me.description: A float representing the maximum measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_measured_c.description: A float representing the standard deviation of a measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_median_mea.description: A float representing the median measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_minimum_me.description: A float representing the minimum measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

measured_compound.description: A controlled vocabulary term representing an analyzed component from a primary_food_type food sampled.

measured_compound_comment.description: A Comment relating to measured component.

measured_compound_data_points_number.description: An integer representing the number of individual samples that comprise a measured_compound sample. 1 if an individual sample >1 if an aggregation of samples.

measured_compound_denominator_unit.description: A unit code representing the denominator units of a measured measured_compound, e.g., g (for portion of per 100g).

measured_compound_denominator_value.description: A float representing the denominator value (or portion size) of a measured measured_compound, e.g., 100 (for portion of per 100g).

measured_compound_record_date.description: A datetime value representing a known recorded date pertaining to an analyzed sample.

measured_compound_unit.description: A unit code representing the units of measurement in which a measured food compont value from a primary_food_type sample was sampled.

measured_compound_value.description: A float representing an individual instance of a measured food compound value from an individual primary_food_type sample.

Component.title: Component

food_preparation_state.description: A controlled vocabulary term representing the preparation state of the primary_food_type (e.g., raw).

primary_food_type.description: A controlled vocabulary term representing the primary food material which was sampled. E.g., using a food vocabulary like USDA's FDC or FoodOn

primary_food_type_label.description: A string denoting the label of a controlled vocabulary term representing the primary food material which was sampled.

primary_food_type_upc_code.description: An integer denoting a Universal Product Code (UPC) barcode.
